episodes.synopsis: Visiting an injured Mimi, Eliot discovers that a clown runs the hospital. / Eliot heads to the school's basement in search of a mysterious character.
episodes.title: Only When I Laugh / The Big Webster

episodes.synopsis: Eliot discovers that kids who wear glasses are remote-controlled by the principal. / Eliot is convinced senior citizens have taken his mother hostage.
episodes.title: Mind Control / Revenge of the Seniors

episodes.synopsis: Eliot decides to go on an all-vegetable diet. / Max the bully immediately starts picking on the new kid in class.
episodes.title: The Vegetari-man / The New Kid in School

episodes.synopsis: Eliot discovers that there is a dirt monster hiding in the laundry. / Eliot discovers an old superhero costume that used to belong to his dad.
episodes.title: Blue Lightning / Hamsterman

episodes.synopsis: Eliot discovers that an old lady in the neighborhood has the power to shrink animals / Eliot is terrified by a horror story about a baby sitter.
episodes.title: Shrinking Animals / Eliot's Nightmare

episodes.synopsis: Eliot discovers that every female he knows plans to leave for the land of girls. / Jeremy asks Eliot to look after his prized garden while he is gone.
episodes.title: The Big Expedition / Nature Is Living Thing

episodes.synopsis: Eliot discovers that a terrible pirate ghost wanders through Max's house. / Eliot has lost his favorite stuffed animal.
episodes.title: The Pirate Ghost / Freddy Has Disappeared

episodes.synopsis: Through a cultural exchange, Eliot's family is host to a young Japanese boy. / Eliot and Kaytoo discover girls can transform into werewolves.
episodes.title: Youki, the Extraterrestrial / The Werewolf

episodes.synopsis: Eliot discovers that a classmate is using a time machine to travel into the past. / The kids decide to start a revolution against the park warden.
episodes.title: In the Time of the Pharaohs / The Revolt

video.title: Eliot Kid
video.synopsis: Eliot Kid's incredible imagination turns everyday life into a world filled with bloodthirsty vampires, man-eating plants, haunted houses and more!
